com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Class SampleColorSchemes

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.SampleColorSchemes
All Implemented Interfaces:
ColorScheme
public class SampleColorSchemes
extends Object
implements ColorScheme

Provides several indexed color schemes. The number of colors is predefined, and you can obtain them deterministically by using the getColorAt() and size() methods.

Method Detail

getNext

public Color getNext()
Description copied from interface: ColorScheme
get the "next" color in the color scheme. This method returns a random color from within the scheme.

Specified by:
getNext in interface ColorScheme
See Also:
